Condor:

Condor didn't loose time and starte to run towards the exit.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Dark Avian::
> The aura of the bars of Condor's cage flicker once or twice, and 
> then go out, with a discharge of energy. The cage unlocks.
> 
> On 28 Feb 2001, at 5:29, airly2000@y... wrote:
> 
> > Condor::
> > 
> > Condor decided, Astroblast didn't see his energon knife he took 
it 
> > and he also took one of his feathers.
> > 
> > If the bars did a discharge of energy he could use that to left 
the 
> > cell. 
> > 
> > Condor threw a large feather in that way that it touched two 
bars. He 
> > was ready to ran away.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > 
> > 
> > > OOC: np =)
> > > 
> > > ::Switchblade::
> > > "Well what do you know, the big nasty bot, Skullgrin!" He shows 
> > > his Decepticon symbol, "I've heard some stuff about you back on 
> > > Cybertron, before I was shot off in a pod destined for here by 
my 
> > > enemies." He looks up at Skullgrin, who is quite taller that 
him, 
> > > "Show me around for a bit, I'd like to see the ship and hear 
who's 
> > > here. If there's a Decepticon Ship, then I bet there's more 
> > > Decepticons around somewhere." Switchblade looks at the ship, 
> > > "I'll bet that there are some nice comfy chairs in the control 
> > room, 
> > > hint hint." He says nudging Skullgrin with his elbow.
> > >

> > > > OOC: I might've missed that post rAuq.

> > familiar.  He
> > > > looks at Condor.  He was asleep(I think).  Oh well, the cage 
> > would keep him
> > > > from escaping anytime soon.  So Skullgrin ran outside.  He 
saw 
> > Switchblade,
> > > > and ran up to him.
> > > > 
> > > >        "What do you want?  You ally or foe?" He questioned.
> > > > 
> > > >        This bot looked oddly familiar, but SKullgrin just
